com.SocScore.framework

Class AccessManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SocScore.framework.AccessManager

  • public class AccessManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class which manages granting access to data editing capabilities

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AccessManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean authenticate(int input)
      Compares input against a stored access code, and sets user as Authenticated if they match.
      static AnalysisViewer setInputType(ScoreKeeperType type)
      Verifies that the user has successfully been authenticated with authenticate(int).
      static AnalysisViewer unAuthenticate()
      Unauthenticates user.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccessManager

        public AccessManager()

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public static boolean authenticate(int input)
        Compares input against a stored access code, and sets user as Authenticated if they match.
        Parameters:
        input - The access code to be checked.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the access code was accepted, false otherwise

      • unAuthenticate

        public static AnalysisViewer unAuthenticate()
        Unauthenticates user.
        Returns:
        returns a AnalysisViewer instance (no data manipulation rights)

      • setInputType

        public static AnalysisViewer setInputType(ScoreKeeperType type)
        Verifies that the user has successfully been authenticated with authenticate(int). If so, the method returns an instance of the data-input objects based on the type requested.
        Parameters:
        type - type of data-edit instance requested
        Returns:
        An instance of the data-input object requested. (defaults to AnalysisViewer)
        See Also:
        LeagueInput, LiveInput, BatchInput
